module sigmoid_tb( );
reg [31:0]x;
wire [31:0]y;
sigmoid instantation1 (x,y);
initial
begin
x=32’b01000000010000000000000000000000;
#100 x=32’b01000000101000000000000000000000;
#100 x=32’b01000000100000000000000000000000;
#100 x=32’b11000000101000000000000000000000;
#100 $stop;
end
endmodule
